attributes.action: reject the plans to monitor all internet use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Communications companies are being asked to record all internet contacts between people to modernise police surveillance tactics in the UK.

Have the Government lost their mind!? Is this the end of our "FREE" society.

Perhaps, if Jacqui Smith wants this so much she should pay for it, after all she could probably claim it on expenses!?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "reject the plans to monitor all internet use."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20349


Prime Minister's Office
